TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant filed for divorce with ORG . After obtaining several forensic expert opinions , it dissolved the applicant ’s marriage , established the amount of child maintenance and divided the matrimonial property on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG brought a partial judgment concerning the sum of child maintenance , and remitted the remainder of the case .
CARDINAL . In the resumed proceedings the ORG delivered a judgment on DATE . On appeal , ORG finally divided the matrimonial property on DATE . This judgment was served on the applicant on DATE .
